overview:
Blair Harrison is an entrepreneur and software designer. He has built a number of pioneering and successful companies including IFILM, FasTV and Second Nature.

Blair founded Frequency in 2009 to make the process of discovering and watching video online as simple and personal as possible.

Prior to Frequency Blair ran IFILM, a website for independent filmmakers which he took over operation of in 2001. Blair built IFILM into one of the ten biggest deliverers of online video. He sold it to Viacom in 2005.

Blair has been involved in online video since 1998 when he founded FasTV, the first video search engine.

He lives in Los Angeles with his wife and son.
